Author: GitHub
Description:
"AI became a weapon, and I wasn't even aware." In this powerful clip, Log4j maintainer Christian Grobmeier explains why ignorance about AI's role in security is the most critical vulnerability for any developer today. It's a wake-up call for the entire open source community.

#Log4j #Log4Shell #Security

Title: Why AI ignorance is the biggest threat to your software
